page.title: 05Brinklow's Woolridge Family
page.content: Whilst the onslaught reigns I'm assembling dinner for Rob's arrival around 5 or 6 or 6.30.Not bad today,positively early,enabling him to do his PTA stint of putting up their new curtains.Several hours later family returns.Almost done,two kids in bed,one small hand clasped tightly in mine whilst the nightly story is read, Kit falls asleep.Jo chatters on about little experiences,Rob continues with school work,I load the washing machine,make tomorrow's sandwiches, snatch some TV and take the paper to bed hoping to read some before sleep defeats me. Well, that was the day that was. Goodnight.
